definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: doubtful word, usu. snare, trap(fr. ‖[[פַּח ]] Job 18:9);—[[חֵילָם]] ´[[וְשָׁאַף ח]] Job 5:5 and a snare snappeth at his wealth (so Bu Bev:Jphil. xxvi. 304 f.; Vrss Di Du and most mod. [[חְמֵאִים]], or [[חָמֵא]], the thirsty, sometiems with change of [[וְשָׁאַף]]); Job 18:9 (‖[[פַּח ]]; Che:Jq ix (1897), 578 [[חִירִים]] pangs, cf. Is 13:8).
